lines: Kamuya ba similimo bakwe Leza; Tucilile mu maulu a Mwami wesu,
Mazwi akwe alatupa nguzu lyoonse, Tubeleke ca nguzu a kutayowa.
Ka muya ba similimo bakwe Leza, Banzala, Kamuya muka basanine;
Kulemekwa kwesu takuka manipe, Nitwamana ku kambauka mulumbe.
Mulimo mpouli ku bonse bayanda, Nkaambo bulelo bwa nyika buya kuwa;
Ndilyona izina lya Leza lyakala Aijwi lyompolola ilufutuko.
Konyonesya lyonse mulimo umane; Batebuli baya kuseluka ansi;
A ku kala mu munzi waba nununwa Nja kuimba nyimbo izya kunununwa.
